Text:
Thank you for taking the time to do this jorell!
It is much appreciated by those of us that cannot otherwise enjoy the brilliant BBC coverage of our beloved sport.
thank you jorell, We the true fans, really appreciate this

This is definately the Race Not Qualifying, a small error as i got got to change the filename on here from the txt document, but the file itself is correctly named and IS the Race, Unfortunately TPB edit facility on your torrents isnt working so i cant update the text!

Many thanks! Enough has been said, about yesterday - not your fault if the source was bad. Lets hope all ok, now. As someone [rightly] pointed out, YOU are the ONLY person trying to help we fans of F1 (who are not otherwise able to see the fun) so you ARE, THE man! Thanks again!
Thanks for the post! Good work!
Thank you jorrell0733...! But I do hope tmdk will be back though...
You sir are a legend. Many thanks for your time and effort and I hope you can continue uploading for the entire season.
Dude, seriously. Thanks alot. Please never stop uploading.
Thx for the upld. Keep up the good work!

I downloaded the Qualifying as well and I tried different players and OSes to make sure it wasn't me. Then I saw it was the rip itself :(.

However! I downloaded this as well and quality is superb/no glitches/...! So I am very thankful for your time and effort! What would we do without you ;)
Thank you so much. I don't have F1 on Tv and I now I can finally start watching again. I really appreciate this.
